name: com.morikatron.toio-sdk-for-unity
description: toio SDK for Unity is a Software Development Kit for controlling toioâ„¢ Core Cube (hereafter referred to as Cubes) in Unity.

samples.description:
This sample uses BLE interface, a low-level module, directly to communicate with Cube.
When run on a smart phone build, Cube will spin around.
This is a sample to see how the behavior of many Cubes changes depending on the mode of CubeNavigator.
This sample is to check if the connection settings are different between Simulator and the real environment.
This sample shows how to use CubeNavigator to move a large number of Cubes while avoiding collisions.
This sample uses Cube's TargetMove and AccelerationMove to reach the target and move in a spiral while accelerating.
This is a sample where multiple mats are lined up and treated as one large mat.
This sample handles scene transitions while maintaining the connection to real Cube and the correlated instance with Cube on Simulator.
This sample detects each sensor value in Cube and displays it in UI.
This sample visualizes the results of HLAvoid calculation of CubeNavigator and all defined walls.

This is a collection of samples for WebGL builds.
If you build the application with WebGL as the platform, BLE module will be automatically changed to a module for WebGL, and you can communicate with the application on the browser page with Cube.
